|ram1_num = 1 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = BR-6435ND |manuf_rev = / GR-435ND |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/29/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = 50 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3572L; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Seems to have a similar configuration to [[D-Link DIR-815 rev B1]] "BP DL E186014" is written on the board. The power adapter included with the device in Europe is a '''DVE''' DSA-12GX-12FEU (12VDC, 1000mA). ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ====TFTP==== Set your computer to some ip address in 192.168.1.0/24 subnet except 192.168.1.6. :Hold down the RST button, while plugging in the router and wait :for PWR and 5G LEDs to light up and in the console type: 
tftp 192.168.1.6
binary
rexmt 1
timeout 20
put /path/to/your/firmware.bin
